DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind study treat subject diagnose pulmonary embolism inhale nitrix oxide . In clinical trial investigator randomize patient receive inhale nitric oxide sham ( nitrogen + oxygen ) 24 hour . Patients must submassive pulmonary embolism ( PE ) evidence right ventricular ( RV ) heart dysfunction . Investigators hypothesize administration inhale NO + oxygen patient severe submassive PE improve RV function , reduce RV strain necrosis improve dyspnea ( difficulty breathe ) sham oxygen treatment .

RV > LV CTPA , 4. elevate troponin I ( > 0.1 ng/mL ) natriuretic peptide ( BNP > 90 pg/mL ) , 5. screen bedside cardiac ultrasound color flow capability show RV dysfunction , 6 .
